pages.text: Created from a collision of $(l:resources/stratine)Stratine$(/l) and $(l:resources/paltaeria)Paltaeria$(/l), this block just sits around in the air when placed.

...well, other blocks seem to be able to float in the air without support just fine for whatever reason, too, but this one is special: $(thing)it preserves any momentum that you give it$(), like via $(item)Piston$(), even if you stand on it.$(br2)Tip: $(k:sneak) + $(k:use) to pick it back up.
